amendment.description: To require additional programs and activities to address distracted, inattentive, and fatigued drivers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2312 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2312 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1240; text: CR S1240) To require additional programs and activities to address distracted, inattentive, and fatigued drivers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2312 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2312 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine to Amendment SA 2285.
